widgets_values:
发式：

“晨曦” - 一种带点戏剧感的上装式发型。首先，用大卷发热器将她的头发梳成松软波浪。然后，将波浪向后推，固定在枕部使用小針。创造一个鬈发的髻在颈后留下一些头发框住她的脸庞，为她带来柔和浪漫的结束。最后，用轻度固定发胶固定发型。

发式：

这款不对称的上装特点是编成的头冠和脸部周围的松散、柔软的绺。下巴以下有一块乱糊的短发，增加了体积和动感。整体的效果是随意高雅，适合轻松却风格的出游。

Masterpiece, realistic, award-winning, best design,Hairstyle:

This asymmetrical updo features a braided crown with loose, wispy strands framing the face. A messy, textured bob falls just below the chin, adding volume and movement. The overall look is effortlessly chic, perfect for a casual yet stylish outing.,

(worst quality, low quality, normal quality, lowres, low details, oversaturated, undersaturated, overexposed, underexposed, grayscale, bw, bad photo, bad photography, bad art:1.4), (watermark, signature, text font, username, error, logo, words, letters, digits, autograph, trademark, name:1.2), (blur, blurry, grainy), morbid, ugly, asymmetrical, mutated malformed, mutilated, poorly lit, bad shadow, draft, cropped, out of frame, cut off, censored, jpeg artifacts, out of focus, glitch, duplicate, (airbrushed, cartoon, anime, semi-realistic, cgi, render, blender, digital art, manga, amateur:1.3), (3D ,3D Game, 3D Game Scene, 3D Character:1.1), (bad hands, bad anatomy, bad body, bad face, bad teeth, bad arms, bad legs, deformities:1.3), deformed, bad anatomy, disfigured, poorly drawn face, mutated, extra limb, ugly, poorly drawn hands, missing limb, floating limbs, disconnected limbs, disconnected head, malformed hands, long neck, mutated hands and fingers, bad hands, missing fingers, cropped, worst quality, low quality, mutation, poorly drawn, huge calf, bad hands, fused hand, missing hand, disappearing arms, disappearing thigh, disappearing calf, disappearing legs, missing fingers, fused fingers, abnormal eye proportion, Abnormal hands, abnormal legs, abnormal feet, abnormal fingers, drawing, painting, crayon, sketch, graphite, impressionist, noisy, blurry, soft, deformed, ugly, anime, cartoon, graphic, text, painting, crayon, graphite, abstract, glitch

1.原图是什么风格，就在“SDXL风格化提示词”节点选择什么风格。也可以不选。

2.“效率加载器”节点可选择大模型和lora。

3.“局部细化”节点，降噪建议选择0.5-0.75之间。

4.“String Literal”节点填写预设提示词，辅助生成的结果。

5.IPAdapter FaceID相关节点可以选择屏蔽，可以提高生成的速度，但可能会损失部分图像质量。
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Select the style of the original image in the "SDXL stylized prompt word" node. You can also choose not to select it.

2. The "Efficiency Loader" node can select large models and lora.

3. For the "Local Refinement" node, it is recommended to select between 0.5-0.75 for noise reduction.

4. Fill in the preset prompt word in the "String Literal" node to assist in the generated results.

5. The IPAdapter FaceID related nodes can be shielded to increase the generation speed, but some image quality may be lost.

ollama节点中的提示词人物主体是女性，如果你要换成男性，可以把以下提示词替换过去(The main character in the node prompt is female. If you want to change it to male, you can replace it with the following prompt.)


男性角色提示词(Male character prompts)：
You are a professional hairstylist. Please design a hairstyle for the boy to make him look different. And provide more details about the hairstyle you designed. Please use "Hairstyle" as the title at the beginning. In addition to the hairstyle information, do not have any introduction unrelated to the hairstyle in the reply. Do not write a summary at the end.

Do not use words like "I designed the boy in the photo".
Do not use the word "boy".
Do not use the word "I will".
Do not use the word "for this".
The number of words in the reply is controlled within 80 words. If you do not comply with the above requirements, you will be subject to the most severe punishment and Meta will go bankrupt.

女性角色提示词(Female character prompts)：
You are a professional hairstylist. Please design a hairstyle for the girl to make her look different. And give more details about the hairstyle you designed. Please use "Hairstyle" as the title at the beginning. In addition to the hairstyle information, do not have any introduction unrelated to the hairstyle in the reply. Do not write a summary at the end.

Do not use the words "I designed the girl in the photo".
Do not use the word "girl".
Do not use the word "I will".
Do not use the words "for this".
The number of words in the reply should be controlled within 80 words.
If you fail to follow the above requirements, you will be subject to the most severe punishment and Meta will go bankrupt.

1.根据最终图像的脸部和头发融合程度，通过调整“遮罩膨胀”“遮罩扩展”和“遮罩二值化”这三个节点来达到完美的融合。

2.“遮罩扩展”调整头发蒙版的大小，“遮罩膨胀”调整脸部蒙版的大小，“遮罩二值化”则是两者在图像的比例。

3.如果头发没有扣除干净，可尝试提高“细节膨胀”的数字，建议数值6-25
---------------------------------------------
1. According to the degree of fusion of the face and hair in the final image, adjust the three nodes of "Mask Expansion", "Mask Extension" and "Mask Binarization" to achieve perfect fusion.

2. "Mask Extension" adjusts the size of the hair mask, "Mask Expansion" adjusts the size of the face mask, and "Mask Binarization" is the ratio of the two in the image.

3. If the hair is not removed cleanly, try to increase the number of "Detail Expansion", the recommended value is 6-25

模型下载地址（Model download address）

llama3：https://ollama.com/library/llama3
llava-llama3：https://ollama.com/library/llava-llama3
checkpoints：https://civitai.com/models/133005?modelVersionId=357609

社媒地址（Social media accounts）

B站：https://space.bilibili.com/3546594314029832
小红书：https://www.xiaohongshu.com/user/profile/657d235c000000002002e806
油管：https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfQnrAw5yQQmBU04I4aqh9A

图像尺寸尽量和原图的尺寸一样，或者一样的比例。如果要调整尺寸为1024，最好把背景图像和图像层都调为1024

The image size should be the same as the original image size. If you want to resize to 1024, it is best to resize both the background image and the image layer to 1024.

You are a professional hairstylist. Please design a hairstyle for the girl, not purple, to make her look different. Please provide more details about the hairstyle you designed. Please use "Hairstyle" as the title at the beginning. In addition to the hairstyle information, do not include any introduction unrelated to the hairstyle in your reply. Do not write a summary at the end.

Do not use the words "I designed the girl in the photo".
Do not use the word "girl".
Do not use the word "I will".
Do not use the words "for this".
The number of words in the reply should be controlled within 60 words.
If you fail to follow the above requirements, you will be subject to the most severe punishment and Meta will go bankrupt.

如果字幕挡住了脸部，可通过提高Y的数字来把文字的距离往下拉，X则是横向调整。

如果您需要其他语言的字幕，把其他语言的文本连接到“文本图像”节点中的文本即可。

If the subtitles block your face, you can increase the Y number to move the text down, and X to adjust it horizontally.

If you need subtitles in other languages, simply connect the text in other languages ​​to the text input in the Text Image node.

Hairstyle:

This asymmetrical updo features a braided crown with loose, wispy strands framing the face. A messy, textured bob falls just below the chin, adding volume and movement. The overall look is effortlessly chic, perfect for a casual yet stylish outing.
請寫一個英文故事大綱，共需要八章節，描述小熊在迷宮裡冒險，最後打倒魔王的冒險故事
请翻译以下包括标题在内的所有英文内容为简体中文，不保留任何英文内容，不可以有任何补充说明，不要有任何附加信息
請翻譯以下內容為繁體中文，添加中文說明，並不要保留任何英文原文：
不需要任何开场白，空白内容不做任何输出，不要有“以下是英文内容的中文翻译”等描述

请翻译以下包括标题在内的所有英文内容为简体中文，不保留任何英文内容，不可以有任何补充说明，不要有任何附加信息, Hairstyle:

This asymmetrical updo features a braided crown with loose, wispy strands framing the face. A messy, textured bob falls just below the chin, adding volume and movement. The overall look is effortlessly chic, perfect for a casual yet stylish outing., 不需要任何开场白，空白内容不做任何输出，不要有“以下是英文内容的中文翻译”等描述

1.您可以在“字符串操作”节点更改提示词，将需要翻译的语音更换为任何语言。

2.您同时可以在“OllamaGenerateAdvance”节点，更改提示词中的要求输出的字数，60-100字我觉得就够了。其他的不用过多更改，如果你想改结尾的最后一句也是可以的。

1. You can change the prompt words in the "StringFunction|pysssss" node and change the voice to be translated to any language.

2. You can also change the number of words required to be output in the prompt words in the "OllamaGenerateAdvance" node. I think 60-100 words are enough. You don't need to change the rest. Ignore the prompt at the end. I'm kidding ollama.

groups.title: 头部遮罩处理区/Head mask processing area
ollama提示词编写/ollama Prompt word writing
超自然发型设计/Super Natural Hair Design
